Package ohos.utils.zson

Class ZSONArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.utils.zson.ZSONArray

  • public class ZSONArray
extends Object
    Provides methods for processing JSON arrays.

    This class encapsulates a JSON array based on the standard JSON data structure. In addition to data read and write, this class provides basic processing capabilities for the arrays, for example, traversing, querying, modifying, and deleting array elements.

    Since:
    1

        Since:
        3

      • ZSONArray

        public ZSONArray​(int initialCapacity)
        A constructor used to create a ZSONArray instance with a specified capacity.
        Parameters:
        initialCapacity - Indicates the initial capacity of the ZSONArray instance to create. This parameter is also used to create a ArrayList<E>, and its maximum value is Integer.MAX_VALUE-8. If you set this parameter to a value larger than Integer.MAX_VALUE-8, the ZSONArray instance fails to be created.
        Since:
        3

        public static final ZSONArray stringToZSONArray​(String text)
        Converts a JSON array string into a ZSONArray object.
        Parameters:
        text - Indicates the JSON array string to convert.
        Returns:
        Returns the ZSONArray object.
        Throws:
        ZSONException - Throws this exception if the conversion fails.
        Since:
        3

                                                  Class<T> clazz)

        Parameters:

        clazz - Indicates the class type of the object list.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of objects of the clazz class type.

      • toZSONObject

        public ZSONObject toZSONObject​(String[] keys)
        Pairs elements in this ZSONArray instance with the specified keys to form a ZSONObject object.

        If the length of keys does not match the length of elements in this ZSONArray instance, the smaller length is used. Elements in the returned object are arranged in accordance with the sequence of keys.

        Parameters:
        keys - Indicates the keys used to match the elements in this ZSONArray instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the ZSONObject object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if keys is null.
        Since:
        4

      • toString

        public String toString​()
        Obtains the JSON-based string representation of the ZSONArray object.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        Returns the JSON-based string representation of ZSONArray.
        Since:
        5
